circumstances: While cruising off Ambone, the twin engine aircraft was attacked by the pilots of two Japanese Air Force Mitsubishi Zero. With one engine on fire, the captain ordered his crew to bail out but only two were able to abandon the aircraft. Two others were killed when the aircraft crashed in flames. Both crew who survived became POW and were executed on November 22, 1942. Crew from the 2nd Squadron.
probable_cause: Shot down by two Japanese fighters.
